body:
I learned about this server recently, so i joined and started playing on it.
If you ever find me in game, i will be probably doing stupid stuff since i'm new and not used to this server yet xD
And i won't be active on the forums a lot, since my main browser (chrome) won't let me connect to this website, so i am forced to use firefox instead.

EDIT: it says on my profile that i joined over 2 years ago. I did actually join once a reaaaaally long time ago, but i didn't like it back then ,
